=== Current Issues ===
Brightness cannot be changed, either with the Fn keys or in  (gconf-editor - I don't know about gconf-editor I could not find it on my system which is kubuntu)

Bug 135062 - Noted below about cursor moving while typing to be repositioned next mouse. Intrepid Ibex 8.10 - Found that the touch pad is now working. Cursor has not moved over the past 30 mins of typing.

Bug 135088 - Hibernate shuts down okay, but on restart presents the GRUB menu. After choosing kubuntu the system is very slow in starting. Eventually it just shuts off. Even using the recovery mode.

Bug 133199 - kMix doesn't suspend sound in speakers when headphones are plugged in. Volume on keys display on the screen but does not adjust the actual volume plus limited on movement. Mute works if Master Channel set to FRONT, but does not work if Master Channel set to PCM.
